name: Ollama
postCreateCommand: /bin/bash -c 'curl -fsSL https://ollama.com/install.sh | sh && sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y python3 python3-pip tmux && pip install ollama && pip install paho-mqtt && tmux new-session -d -s ollama_session "ollama serve" && sleep 10 && ollama pull deepseek-r1:1.5b && ollama pull llama3.2'
